SELECT t1.COURSE_CODE_ courseCode, t1.COURSE_NAME_ courseName, t1.TRAINING_LEVEL_ trainingLevel, t1.CREDITS_ credits, t1.FACULTY_ faculty, t3.ID_ teachingClassId FROM course_open_t t1 JOIN teaching_task_t t2 ON t2.COURSE_OPEN_ID_ = t1.ID_ JOIN teaching_class_t t3 ON t3.TASK_ID_ = t2.ID_ JOIN elc_affinity_courses_t t4 ON t4.TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ = t3.ID_ LEFT JOIN courses_label_t CL ON t3.COURSE_LABEL_ID_ = CL.ID_
t4.CALENDAR_ID_ = #{calendarId}
and t1.COURSE_CODE_ like concat('%',#{courseCode},'%')
and t2.COURSE_NAME_ like concat('%',#{courseName},'%')
